description.value:
Access Krava

Where you walk, the ground sings in joy. The natural vegetation of the climate sprouts into being, even in devastated lands. The effect is constant and subtle, giving just a touch of life where once there was none. Used purposefully, you may, once a day, cause an effect like the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZhJ8d9Uk4lwIx86b] ritual with you serving as the only caster, causing plants to erupt from you in a sudden wave of life and vibrance. This is a [three-actions] activity with the manipulate trait. When you or an ally within the radius of the effect is using Survival to find food, water, or stave off natural hazards, they enjoy a +2 status bonus to the check. If you have used this effect before within 30 days, your Nature check suffers a -2 penalty per previous time you've used it.

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition
